purpose: The email invites submissions for the 21st International Conference on Information Systems Security (ICISS 2025), which will take place at the Indian Institute of Technology Indore from December 16–20, 2025. It highlights the conference as a premier international forum for researchers, academicians, and industry professionals to share findings in cybersecurity and related fields. Important dates for submissions and notifications are provided, along with a link to the official conference website for further details.

conf_name_candidates.raw: 21st International Conference on Information Systems Security (ICISS 2025)
conf_name_candidates.evidence: We are pleased to invite paper submissions for the *21st International Conference on Information Systems Security (ICISS 2025),* to be hosted by the Indian Institute of Technology Indore (IIT Indore), India from *December 16–20, 2025*.
We look forward to your contributions and participation in ICISS 2025!

evidence_sentences: We are pleased to invite paper submissions for the *21st International Conference on Information Systems Security (ICISS 2025),* to be hosted by the Indian Institute of Technology Indore (IIT Indore), India from *December 16–20, 2025*.

ICISS is a premier international forum that brings together researchers, academicians, and industry professionals to share their latest findings and insights in the fields of cybersecurity, cryptography, system security, and hardware security.
For more details, submission guidelines, and updates, please visit the official conference website: ICISS 2025 | Home <https://iciss.isrdc.in/>
